Producer: Nina Yang Bongiovi, Rebecca Hall, Margot Hand, Forest Whitaker
Production Co: Sight Unseen Pictures, Flat Five Productions, Significant Productions, TGCK Partners, Film4, Sweet Tomato Films, Endeavor Content, Gamechanger Films, XRM Media, Picture Films
Synopsis: In 1920s New York City, a Black woman finds her world upended when her life becomes intertwined with a former childhood friend who's passing as white.
Title: Passing
